channel.title: How to change tele
channel.description: well im useing evelutionclient not my server but im useing it and i was wondering how do u make the tele work and how to make it tele to a place like i wana tele to varroke how do i make it do that when i click it? also how do i cahnge the writing like its this @ and i want it to be @ and it acualy works when i press it how do i change that? blank vorrock

Read full topic

item.title: How to change tele
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

When you click on a teleport, look in your command prompt (It’s the black box that you use to run your server) You will get a case number (Example: I think varrock is 4140). Go into clickingMost.java, look for that case number. Add a triggertele method for where you want it to teleport to.

c.triggerTele(3088, 3503, 0);

The first number is the x coordinate, the second number is the y coordinate, the third is the height level (If you want to teleport upstairs or something)

If you want to change the text of something, go to textHandler.java. Search for the text that you want to change, Type whatever you want.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change tele
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I’m assuming it’s a 317?

  1. Clickingmost.java, Find the case ID and modify the coordinates
  2. texthandler.java, self explanatory.

Read full topic
